```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# Load cleaned data
final_df <- read_csv(here("data", "derived", "offset_perm_rev_long_cleaned.csv"))

```

## Summary Statistics

```{r summary}
final_df %>% 
  count(program_type, sort = TRUE)


final_df %>%
  count(program_type) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(program_type, n), y = n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Frequency of Program Types", x = "Program Type", y = "Count")

final_df %>%
  count(permanence_risk_domain, permanence_risk_category) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```
